message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counteroffer at $105. It's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $100? That's the lowest I can go.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'll make a new offer, taking into account the value of the product and our previous discussions. I'll counteroffer at $108. It's a fair price considering the product's quality and your willingness to negotiate.
